name: Cookies vs. Claus
description: Cookies vs. Claus is an action-packed battle game. With a range of characters to choose from, you can battle as your favorite cookie or take on a squad as a holiday character. Through both single and multiplayer, experience a unique asymmetric shooter that combines elements of FPS and battle arena games. THIS IS COOKIES VS. CLAUS!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 460/Radeon HD 5850/Intel HD 4600 with at least 1024 MB video RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
